author: dims
msg: try getName as getCanonicalName causes an NPE

author: vborja
msg: If user supplies --auth or --anon options and is already running on a buildr-git clone,
the remote.origin.url is updated. This way when an anonymous user becomes a
committer he just needs to run buildr-git.rb --auth
